short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PixelPalette: Instantly get any pixel's color code. Perfect for designers and developers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Pixel Palette, the ultimate browser extension for designers, developers, and color enthusiasts! Effortlessly discover and capture colors from any webpage, and easily access their exact RGB, HEX, and CMYK color codes for seamless integration into your projects.

With Pixel Palette, you'll enjoy a one-click color picker that activates when you click on any pixel on a webpage, instantly revealing its color codes. Get comprehensive color information, including RGB, HEX, and CMYK values, and view color codes in a compact tooltip window that appears next to the selected pixel. The latest updates include automatic color code copying when you click on a color code (Version 0.0.5) and improved tooltip visibility (Version 0.0.4).

Don't waste time searching for the perfect color match; let Pixel Palette streamline your design process and boost your creativity. Install the Pixel Palette browser extension today!

Support Pixel Palette:
